config.SaturationToggle.name: Saturation Toggle
config.SaturationToggle.description: Choose between the saturated or desaturated versions. It's best to match this to the main Vanilla Tweaks mod.
config.SeasonalColouredSeedbags.name: Seasonal Toggle
config.SeasonalColouredSeedbags.descript: Choose whether to use seasonal versions of the seed bags or not. It's best to match this to the main Vanilla Tweaks mod.
